mapper.select:
SELECT b.buss_no , b.prjt_no , p.prjt_nm , NVL(b.buss_upcd, 0) AS buss_upcd , b.buss_nm , m.memb_id , CASE b.buss_imp WHEN '0J1' THEN '상' WHEN '0J2' THEN '중' WHEN '0J3' THEN '하' END AS buss_imp , b.buss_prgre , b.buss_frdt , b.buss_todt , b.buss_st FROM business b LEFT JOIN project p ON b.prjt_no = p.prjt_no LEFT JOIN business_member m ON b.buss_no = m.buss_no WHERE buss_st = '0K1' OR buss_st = '0K3'
ORDER BY buss_no

SELECT buss_no , prjt_no , NVL(buss_upcd, 0) AS buss_upcd , buss_nm , CASE buss_imp WHEN '0J1' THEN '상' WHEN '0J2' THEN '중' WHEN '0J3' THEN '하' END AS buss_imp , buss_prgre , buss_frdt , buss_todt , buss_st FROM business WHERE buss_st = '0K1' OR buss_st = '0K3'
ORDER BY buss_no
mapper.update: UPDATE business SET buss_st = 'DELAY' WHERE buss_st = 'PROCEED' AND sysdate > buss_todt
